105467:
Every day's made of stone
Tonight my wordless dreams slip into song
City lights I can see
Beckon to me
I'm not wastin' more time
No–o–o
From far away they promise me fame
Follow them right on through

Oh I'm on the run
Tonight and every day
I want everything
‘Cause I want everything

Oh I'm on the run
I'm not afraid to say
I want everything
‘Cause I want everything
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I woke up this morning
Hunger was gnawing my soul
But the preacher man's sermon
Won't put no food in my bowl

Abidjan to Monrovia
Looking for food and a home
Instead I found factions and armies
In the middle of a combat zone

I want love, I need love
I want love
I want love, I need love,
And a little food in my bowl

Here in this tribal warfare
For food you need money or a gun
I signed up - whose side I don't care
At least now I'm someone

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Everyone's feeling pretty
It's hotter than july
Though the world's full of problems
They couldn't touch us even if they tried
From the park I hear rhythms
Marley's hot on the box
Tonight there will be a party
On the corner at the end of the block

Didn't Know You
Would Be Jammin' Until The Break Of Dawn
I Bet Nobody Ever Told You That You
Would Be Jammin' Until The Break Of Dawn
You Would Be Jammin' And Jammin' And Jammin' Jam On

They Want Us To Join Their Fighting
But Our Answer Today
Is To Let All Our Worries
Like The Breeze Through Our Fingers Slip Away
Peace Has Come To Zimbabwe
...

(1409613209382)

Sweet sweet,
Dream so sweetly tonight,
Sweet sweet,
Dream so sweetly tonight,

I first seen you on the market place,
Chopping, peeling sticks of sugar cane,
I fell in love with your sweet smile,

Slip away from the city race,
Follow me to a lonely place,
Come lie down by my waterfall,

Sweet sweet,
Come dreem sweetly tonight,
Sweet sweet,

Oh oh oh oh oh
Salima, Salima, Salima perdoname

Oh mi mas bello amor no te oferezco el sol
Oh querido amor
Tu eres mi sueno no llores mi nina, Salima

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I'm gonna rock you child
I'm gonna rock you tender
I'll sing a song of mine
Will make you feel so tender
I hold you tight and keep my fears at bay

When I was just a child
My life was not so tender
They wouldn't sing to me
And though I still remember
Hard times that I've been through
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Oh Lord I made it through
I'm gonna lay down my load
One more mile or two
Can't escape from my fate, no

Long is the way
Long is the way
Long is the way
Long is the way

All clad in silk and gold
I have seen kings and their queens
With just one single golden thread
I could have woven dreams
I've dug for gold it's true
And those kings granted loans
But I'm still empty-handed
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Tonight is free, tonight the streets
Echo the sounds of the carnival
Run will flow, crowd will grow
Filin' the streets as drums start the beat
We got rhythm strong
Burnin' in our thights
Celebrate all night long 'cause we're alive
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Mama sat down and spoke today
While there's life
There is hope, it's comin' your way
Listen to me
Oh just hear the words I say

Mama tells me I'm like those fools
Clammed up tight
Holding back what they should say
Pressure building up the storm
Is gonna break some day
